sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Software Instance
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
DECLARE @FirstSeen DATETIME = '20180101'
SELECT installed_on AS installed_on , AssetName , SerialNumber , MacAddress , AssetType
, Software_Correlation_ID AS software_correlation_id , CAST(name + '_:::_' + CASE WHEN SoftwareVersion = '' THEN 'NULL' ELSE SoftwareVersion END AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as [key]
, Installdate AS install_date , name + '-' + AssetName AS [name]
FROM ( SELECT CAST(tblSoftwareUni.SoftID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Software_Correlation_ID , tblSoftwareUni.softwareName AS [name] , tblSoftwareUni.softwarePublisher AS [manufacturer] , CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) SoftwareVersion , Installdate , installed_on , AssetName , SerialNumber , MACAddress , AssetType FROM tblSoftwareUni
INNER JOIN ( -- include windows software where the asset still exists SELECT softID , softwareVersion AS SoftwareVersion , tblAssets.AssetID , CAST(Installdate AS datetime) Installdate , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') AS installed_on , AssetName , (SELECT SerialNumber FROM tblAssetCustom tac WHERE tac.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID) AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress
, CASE WHEN tblComputersystem.Domainrole IS NULL THEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole > 1 THEN 'WindowsServer' WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole IN (0,1) THEN 'WindowsPC' END AS AssetType
FROM tblSoftware INNER JOIN tblAssets ON tblSoftware.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssets.FirstSeen > @FirstSeen INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes ON tblAssets.Assettype = tsysAssetTypes.AssetType LEFT OUTER JOIN tblComputersystem ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID
)OSApplications ON tblSoftwareUni.SoftID = OSApplications.softID
)software_packages
ORDER BY Name, installed_on
